chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall n : name, message_delivered_label {| pSrc := n; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} MsgUnlock

Premises:
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
message_delivered_label = fun (p : packet) (l : label) => forall (l' : label) (net net' : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), lb_step_async net l' net' tr -> In p (nwPackets net) -> ~ In p (nwPackets net') -> l = l' : packet -> label -> Prop
Unlock_enables_MsgUnlock : forall n : name, message_enables_label {| pSrc := n; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} MsgUnlock
Lock_delivered_MsgLock : forall i : Client_index, message_delivered_label {| pSrc := Client i; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (MsgLock i)
head_grant_state_unlock : forall (st : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), step_async_star step_async_init st tr -> queue (nwState st Server) = c :: t -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets st) \/ held (nwState st (Client c)) = true \/ In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets st)
Lock_enables_MsgLock : forall i : Client_index, message_enables_label {| pSrc := Client i; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (MsgLock i)
packet_eta : forall p : packet, {| pSrc := pSrc p; pDst := pDst p; pBody := pBody p |} = p
MsgUnlock_moves_client : forall (n : nat) (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c -> now (occurred MsgUnlock) s -> next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) n c /\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0))))) s
clients_only_move_up_in_queue : forall (n : nat) (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c -> weak_until (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) (S n) c) (next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) n c /\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0)))))) s
decomposition_invariant = fun (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (d : Decomposition B M) => conj (conj state_invariant_init (conj (fun (p : packet) (H : False) => False_ind (network_invariant init_handlers p) H) I)) (fun (a a' : network) (os : list (name * (input + list output))) (H : state_invariant (nwState a) /\ (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets a) -> network_invariant (nwState a) p) /\ distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (nwPackets a)) (H0 : step_async a a' os) => let H1 : a = a -> a' = a' -> os = os -> state_invariant (nwState a') /\ (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets a') -> network_invariant (nwState a') p) /\ distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (nwPackets a')...
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps)
LockServ_nwnw_net_handlers_new_new : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> LockServ_network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and LockServ_network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps)
LockServ_nwnw_input_handlers_new_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> distinct_pairs_and LockServ_network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : name) (ps : list (name * msg)) => map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => (when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |});; ret (MsgLock c) | Server => ret Nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end;; ret MsgUnlock | Locked => ret Nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
unlabeled_multi_params = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams base_params) => {| name := lb_name; msg := lb_msg; msg_eq_dec := lb_msg_eq_dec; name_eq_dec := lb_name_eq_dec; nodes := lb_nodes; all_names_nodes := lb_all_names_nodes; no_dup_nodes := lb_no_dup_nodes; init_handlers := lb_init_handlers; net_handlers := unlabeled_net_handlers; input_handlers := unlabeled_input_handlers |} : forall base_params : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams base_params -> MultiParams base_params Arguments unlabeled_multi_params {base_params labeled_multi_params}
LockServ_BaseParams = {| data := Data; input := Input; output := Output |} : BaseParams
init_data = fun _ : Name => {| queue := []; held := false |} : Name -> Data
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
locks_correct_unlock_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pSrc p = Client c -> pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
LockServ_LabeledParams = {| lb_name := Name; lb_msg := Msg; lb_msg_eq_dec := Msg_eq_dec; lb_name_eq_dec := Name_eq_dec; lb_nodes := Nodes; lb_all_names_nodes := In_n_Nodes; lb_no_dup_nodes := nodup; label := Label; label_silent := Silent; lb_init_handlers := init_data; lb_net_handlers := fun (dst src : Name) (msg : Msg) (s : data) => runGenHandler s (NetHandler dst src msg); lb_input_handlers := fun (nm : Name) (msg : input) (s : data) => runGenHandler s (InputHandler nm msg) |} : LabeledMultiParams LockServ_BaseParams
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_async {P params} Arguments StepAsync_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepAsync_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
Inductive lb_step_async (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation network label (name * (input + list output)) := LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_async net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)] | LabeledStepAsync_input : forall (h : lb_name)...
LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_async net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
ClientIOHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Lock => send (Server, Lock);; ret (InputLock i) | Unlock => data <- get;; when (held data) (put {| queue := []; held := false |};; send (Server, Unlock));; ret (InputUnlock i) | Locked => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
nwnw_unlock_lock : forall p q : packet, LockServ_network_network_invariant p q -> pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Lock
